alert.note: Alert for Upton; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 1:11PM CDT until October 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. * WHERE...Winkler and Upton Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
